channel.title: How do I get items to spawn or equip the guy in this game
channel.description: What do i do i see the id;s for the items but where do i put them? how do I use them?

item.title: How do I get items to spawn or equip the guy in this game
item.dc:creator: @Shadow_str Shadow str
item.description:
@Shadow_str wrote:

In order to spawn stuff u need authority like admin maybe mod (depends on server settings) or owner and their shud be a
opition called item id so you would type ::pickup (item id here) (number of items u want here) so does that help you.
hope so peace out hommie.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I get items to spawn or equip the guy in this game

item.title: How do I get items to spawn or equip the guy in this game
item.dc:creator: @bib bib
item.description:
@bib wrote:

to get the item in-game do ::pickup id {where it says id type the number in}
